TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SettingsProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: 在内部作为类使用，表示有关个别配置属性的元数据。

span.span: Used internally as the class that represents metadata about an individual configuration property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于描述设置属性的派生类。 is used to describe settings properties of a class derived from . 设置 API 允许设置属性来分组到的公共语言运行时类的集合。The Settings API allows a collection of settings properties to be grouped into a common language runtime class. 保持设置时，基类要求一系列类型的集合中分组的对象。When persisting settings, the base class asks for a collection of objects, grouped in a collection of type . 通过调用其自身的属性成员执行此操作。It does this by calling its own Properties member. 继承的类应返回要保持属性的集合。Inherited classes should return a collection of properties to persist. 每个对象包含有关的属性，包括以下元数据：Each object includes metadata about the property, including the following: - 名称。Name. - 默认值。Default value. - 属性类型。Property type. - 序列化方法。Serialization method. - 要使用的持久性提供程序。Provider to use for persistence. - 上下文和特定于提供程序的其他任意属性。Other arbitrary attributes that are context and provider specific.
